channel.title: Comments on: Why Johnny Can’t Sing Hymns

item.title: By: Mike Fendrich
item.dc:creator: Mike Fendrich
item.description:
Max Insightful - thank you for catching that. Sorry for the mixup, as an "older dude" with new technology - well, let's just say I don't multi-task very well.
Mike Fendrich
item.content:encoded:
Max Insightful – thank you for catching that. Sorry for the mixup, as an “older dude” with new technology – well, let’s just say I don’t multi-task very well.

Mike Fendrich

item.title: By: Stephen
item.dc:creator: Stephen
item.description: Sounds like a good read,I will await further comment on it in the future and fit it into a tight reading schedule if possible.Pick the bone of it's meat and share it with poor guys who don't have time to read like we would like to.
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a good read,I will await further comment on it in the future and fit it into a tight reading schedule if possible.Pick the bone of it’s meat and share it with poor guys who don’t have time to read like we would like to.

item.title: By: Max Doner
item.dc:creator: Max Doner
item.description: Mike - Did you mean to say inciteful, or insightful? Those two words convey two entirely different things.
item.content:encoded: Mike – Did you mean to say inciteful, or insightful? Those two words convey two entirely different things.

item.title: By: Richard Barcellos
item.dc:creator: Richard Barcellos
item.description: Mike, now older dudes are recommending it. Thanks, sage.
item.content:encoded: Mike, now older dudes are recommending it. Thanks, sage.

item.title: By: Mike Fendrich
item.dc:creator: Mike Fendrich
item.description: PR Highly recommend the book - also his "why Johnny Can't Preach". Gordon teaches media ecology at Grove City College, specializing in how media environment effects. The chapter on "Contemporaniety as a Value" is particularly inciteful. He has been on The White Horse in several times. We have both on our book rack at church.
item.content:encoded: PR Highly recommend the book – also his “why Johnny Can’t Preach”. Gordon teaches media ecology at Grove City College, specializing in how media environment effects. The chapter on “Contemporaniety as a Value” is particularly inciteful. He has been on The White Horse in several times. We have both on our book rack at church.
